title: Lord Rama: An Ideal Leader | Lessons from Lord Rama | Sri Sampati Dasa
speaker: HG Satya Gaura Chandra Dasa

segments.key_quote: A leader is the one who builds immense trust in the heart of the followers.
segments.summary: A leader must have integrity to build trust and credibility with their followers.

segments.key_quote: Lord Ram teaches the importance of being truthful and honoring the promise and being respectful towards our own words.
segments.summary: Lord Rama is presented as the greatest leader because he sacrificed his kingdom to honor his father's promise, demonstrating truthfulness and integrity.

segments.key_quote: You must always, always walk the talk.
segments.summary: Lord Rama teaches that leaders must keep their promises, maintain integrity, and align their actions with their words to maintain credibility and inspire followers.
